publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4421 Pauline McNeill: Financial Support for Gaza and the West Bank—That the Parliament welcomes the latest humanitarian assistance plan, initiated by the European Union, Russia, the United Nations and the United States of America, to deliver funding for the management of essential public services such as health care and education in the West Bank and Gaza; supports further international humanitarian assistance measures required to address the tragic lack of hospital resources and supplies in both territories; recognises that the freezing of foreign aid since January 2006 has greatly diminished the ability of the Palestinian Authority to pay over 165,000 public sector employees; notes that 25% of West Bank and Gaza residents depend on Palestinian Authority wages for their livelihoods, and therefore opposes the continued withholding of crucial tax and customs revenues from the authority.

S2M-4421 Pauline McNeill: Financial Support for Gaza and the West Bank—That the Parliament welcomes the latest humanitarian assistance plan, initiated by the European Union, Russia, the United Nations and the United States of America, to deliver funding for the management of essential public services such as health care and education in the West Bank and Gaza; supports further international humanitarian assistance measures required to address the tragic lack of hospital resources and supplies in both territories; recognises that the freezing of foreign aid since January 2006 has greatly diminished the ability of the Palestinian Authority to pay over 165,000 public sector employees; notes that 25% of West Bank and Gaza residents depend on Palestinian Authority wages for their livelihoods, and therefore opposes the continued withholding of crucial tax and customs revenues from the authority. Supported by: Bill Butler*, Rob Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Mark Ballard*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Michael McMahon*, Eleanor Scott*, Patrick Harvie*, Bruce Crawford*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-4421 Financial Support for Gaza and the West Bank (lodged on 18 May 2006) Tommy Sheridan*, Scott Barrie*, Linda Fabiani*, Marlyn Glen*, Sarah Boyack*

S2M-4421 Financial Support for Gaza and the West Bank (lodged on 18 May 2006) Trish Godman*, Nora Radcliffe*, Jackie Baillie*, John Home Robertson*, Alasdair Morgan*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-4421 Financial Support for Gaza and the West Bank (lodged on 18 May 2006) Michael Matheson*
S2M-4421 Financial Support for Gaza and the West Bank (lodged on 18 May 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4421 Financial Support for Gaza and the West Bank (lodged on 18 May 2006) Dr Jean Turner*, Frances Curran*
S2M-4421 Financial Support for Gaza and the West Bank (lodged on 18 May 2006) Cathy Peattie*
